name: Nhymade
description:
Nhymade is an art game created by the team of art students "Blue Phoenix Studios" in ENTI Barcelona.

In this game you will explore an abandoned palace while founding some misterious pices of a book that will tell the story of what that place was. The main objective of the game is to show a beautiful and artistic scene with 3d assets.

Hope that you enjoy our art and the little game that we are creating together! Feedback is apreciated!
